mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_Law (article, paragraph, title, content, regdate, del_check) values (#{article}, #{paragraph}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regdate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_Law WHERE del_check = 0 AND seq_no = #{seq_no}
SELECT TITLE FROM TB_Law WHERE del_check = 0 GROUP BY TITLE
SELECT article FROM TB_Law WHERE del_check = 0 AND title = #{title} GROUP BY article
